EmailTemplate.description: Once a licensing transaction requiring signature of BRC Consent by one of the household member / person on premise is submitted, this email is sent to require the household member / person on premise to sign a BRC consent
EmailTemplate.name: 69b - Request signature of Household Member BRC consent (<18)
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Early Education and Care - {!Household_Member__c.First_Name__c} {!Household_Member__c.Last_Name__c} BRC Consent Form is ready for signature
